course.title: Curriculum test
course.description: A curated collection of the best open-access resources, mapped to the official ETS domains and powered by active recall.

supplemental_resources.description: Additional PDF resources for deeper study. These open-access textbooks cover topics across all sections.

pdfs.title: OpenStax Prealgebra 2e
pdfs.description: Comprehensive prealgebra textbook covering number operations, fractions, decimals, ratios, geometry, and introductory algebra.

pdfs.title: OpenIntro Statistics 4th Edition
pdfs.description: Open-source statistics textbook covering data visualization, descriptive statistics, probability, and regression.

pdfs.title: MathCentre - Decimals Guide
pdfs.description: Concise guide to decimal operations and place value.

pdfs.title: OpenStax Prealgebra - Links to Literacy
pdfs.description: Reading comprehension strategies for mathematical text and word problems.
